Articles.Content:
19 year old texturing artist here, just played this epic game for a few hours now and wanted to look at the mods.

However, I think the textures on most mod packs aren\'t too good, so I\'m here to make my own huge modpack.

I can do 3D modeling too, got quite a bit of experience with z-brush and 3ds max

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

Make sure to post your mods on the Projects and Release subforum, because I\'ll be very happy to see them when they are finished.

Anyway, welcome to the forums!

Textures are what make models awesome and so, yes, bring on the hi res texture pack!

On this note I wonder if there\'s a hi res texture pack for terrain...
Not when ship parts are the only moddable part at this point.

Textures are what make models awesome and so, yes, bring on the hi res texture pack!

On this note I wonder if there\'s a hi res texture pack for terrain...

I\'ve read somewhere around here that all the current terrain and environment textures are the standard placeholders that come with the Unity engine. Eventually, this entire game will look 100x better.

I\'ve read somewhere around here that all the current terrain and environment textures are the standard placeholders that come with the Unity engine. Eventually, this entire game will look 100x better.

Game engines can be tweaked to support higher resolutions if they don\'t support them already.
